Earthbolt.name: Earthbolt
Earthbolt.flavor: At your command, the ground beneath your enemies erupts in jagged fangs of stone.
Earthbolt.onHit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Earthbolt.effect: The burst creates a zone of uneven stone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain.

Rooted to the Earth.name: Rooted to the Earth
Rooted to the Earth.flavor: The earth grants you or your friend its immovable mass and deep power.
Rooted to the Earth.trigger: You or an ally within 2 squares of you is bloodied, pulled, pushed, or slid by an enemy attack
Rooted to the Earth.effect: The target can use his or her second wind and isnâ€™t subject to the forced movement, if any.

Black Obelisk of Doom.name: Black Obelisk of Doom
Black Obelisk of Doom.flavor: You call forth a great pillar of rock. An ancient rune of destruction is carved on it. Enemies that behold it are drawn to their doom.
Black Obelisk of Doom.effect: You conjure a black obelisk that fills an unoccupied square within range. The obelisk must be on a solid surface and is a 10-foot-high solid obstacle. It lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the obelisk is weakened until the start of its next turn. When the obelisk appears, it makes an attack that is a close burst 4.
Black Obelisk of Doom.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage, and the target is pulled 3 squares toward the obelisk and immobilized (save ends).
Black Obelisk of Doom.sustainMinor: The obelisk persists. As a standard action, you can make its attack again.
